title: vMetalBlack v0104S premium
summary: Multifunction Android Wear watch face for WatchMaker Premium v.3.4 or later

descriptionHTML:
Version 0104S premium from 25 May 2015
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Multifunction Android Wear watch face for WatchMaker Premium v.3.4 or later.


-----------------------------------------------------
!!! --- >>> You will need to install the WatchMaker Premium v3.4 or higher in order to use this watch face: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY
-----------------------------------------------------


Features:
- 4 color choices;
- adjusting the brightness of the dimmed mode;
- 2 digital clock mode (12/24);
- weather forecast;
- displaying calendar events;
- list events calendar;
- step counter;
- flashlight mode;
- stopwatch;
- battery level;
- etc


!!! --- >>> Attention! This watchface is protected and is not intended for self-editing. Buying this watchface, you agree to the condition.



Installation:
---------------------------------------
1. Install on your phone WatchMaker Premium: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY
2. Check it works in conjunction with your watch (set to watch any available dial available in WatchMaker Premium)
3. Install from Google Play this watchface (vMetalBlack v.XXX)
4. This watchface will appear on the tab "MY WATCHES" of WatchMaker Premium program
5. Select this watchface
6. Set the watchface on your watch, by clicking on the green button "SET WATCHFACE"
7. Ready!


Enjoy using :)



Update history:
------------------------------------------------------

0102S ---> 0103S 22.05.2015
- indicators "charging", "disconnection" and so on, moved to the center of the screen;
- optimization;
- minor improvements

0103S ---> 0104S 25.05.2015
- fixed the calendar on the home screen;
- optimization
comments: My daily driver Love it. Clean design with lots of features. All works. Subtle lighting/shadows are class. No battery life issues. LG G Watch.
Great face, but kills battery I love the look of the face and what it can do, but for some reason it kills my battery.
Nice looking watch face But needs more colour options, it should have at least the same number as standard android wear.
Very neat, clean watch. However it's a battery killer! Using it on Smartwatch 3 and I notice a significant change in the battery life.
Flash light Love the design and what it does just wondering it says flashlight but cannot find it was it just a typo.              Edit.  Ah now I see thanks for clearing that up
recentChanges: - fixed the calendar on the home screen;
